H0.text: The Corryvreckan whirlpool lies to the north of which Scottish island. Islay

H1.text: The Corryvreckan whirlpool lies to the north of which Scottish island. Mull

H2.text: The Corryvreckan whirlpool lies to the north of which Scottish island. Skye

H3.text: The Corryvreckan whirlpool lies to the north of which Scottish island. JURA

A4.text: The Gulf of Corryvreckan is a narrow strait between the islands of Jura and Scarba, in Argyll and Bute.
